sentences.sentence: Get the projection matrix exactly right and use of the default Oculus head model.
sentences.translation: 使用Oculus默认的头部模型(head Model)和并使得投影矩阵完全正确。

sentences.sentence: When extended mode isactive, rendering works as usual, with no Oculus intervention.
sentences.translation: 当扩展模式是激活的，渲染就照常工作不用人为干预。

sentences.sentence: The scientists also use the Oculus Rift headset, equipment often used for video games.
sentences.translation: 科学家们还使用通常用于视频游戏的虚拟现实设备。
